name: Assure Holdings Corp.
description: Assure Holdings Corp. is a healthcare services company that focuses on providing intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring (IONM) and related services to ensure patient safety during surgical procedures. Founded in 2017, Assure is dedicated to enhancing the quality of surgical care by offering expert monitoring of the nervous system's function in real-time, which can help prevent complications and improve surgical outcomes. The company leverages advanced technologies and a team of highly trained professionals to deliver its services across various specialties, including orthopedic, neurosurgery, and spine surgery. Assure is committed to innovation and continuous improvement, investing in training and technology to ensure the highest standards of care. The company operates in a rapidly growing sector as more healthcare providers recognize the importance of IONM in enhancing patient safety and surgical efficacy. With a vision to lead the market in neurophysiological monitoring, Assure Holdings is positioned for growth, driven by its commitment to quality and patient-centric care.

seo.meta_title: Assure Holdings Corp. | Intraoperative Neurophysiological Monitoring
seo.meta_description: Assure Holdings Corp. specializes in intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring to enhance patient safety during surgeries. Learn more about our services and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What services does Assure Holdings provide?
faq.answer: Assure Holdings provides intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring (IONM) and related consultation services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Assure Holdings?
faq.answer: John A. Farlinger is the CEO of Assure Holdings Corp.

faq.question: Where is Assure Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Assure Holdings is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, USA.
